title: UN Resolution on Legality of Arming Rebels/ Insurgents/ Freedom Fighters or Terrorists?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – “If crime-fighters fight crime and fire-fighters fight fires, what do freedom fighters fight?” George Carlin The world finds difficulty in ushering peace because of the adage ‘one man’s freedom fighter is another man’s terrorist’. Wars resulted in victors and losers. Today, there are no wars instead there is the…
